00002 #define FLYWEIGHT_H

00004 #include <map>
00005 #include <vector>
00006 #include <iostream>

00029 template <typename ValueType, typename UniqueTag=int>
00030 class FlyWeight{
00031     public:
00032         typedef int Proxy_t;
00033         typedef std::map<ValueType,Proxy_t> ValueToProxyMap;
00034         typedef std::vector<ValueType> ProxyToValueMap;
00035 
00036         FlyWeight():fProxy(-1){}
00037         void Reset(){fProxy=-1;}
00038 
00039         void operator=(const ValueType& v){
00040             SetValue(v);
00041         }
00042         void SetValue(const ValueType&);
00043         const ValueType& GetValue()const;
00044 
00045     private:
00046         Proxy_t fProxy;
00047         static ProxyToValueMap sProxyToVals;
00048         static ValueToProxyMap sValsToProxies;
00049 };
00050 
00051 template <typename ValueType, typename UniqueTag>
00052 inline const ValueType& FlyWeight<ValueType,UniqueTag>::GetValue()const{
00053     if(fProxy<0) std::cerr<<"Trying to get a value "
00054         "from an unitialized flyweight"<<std::endl;
00055     return sProxyToVals.at(fProxy);
00056 }
00057 
00058 template <typename ValueType, typename UniqueTag>
00059 inline void FlyWeight<ValueType,UniqueTag>::SetValue(const ValueType& v){
00060     // Is this proxy already contained in the maps
00061     typename ValueToProxyMap::const_iterator it=sValsToProxies.find(v);
00062     if(it!=sValsToProxies.end()){
00063         fProxy=it->second;
00064     } else {
00065         // if it's a new kind, add the source to the hash table
00066         fProxy=sValsToProxies.size();
00067         sValsToProxies[v]=fProxy;
00068         sProxyToVals.push_back(v);
00069     }
00070 }
00071 
00072 template <typename ValueType, typename UniqueTag>
00073   typename FlyWeight<ValueType,UniqueTag>::ProxyToValueMap 
00074   FlyWeight<ValueType,UniqueTag>::sProxyToVals;
00075 
00076 template <typename ValueType, typename UniqueTag>
00077   typename FlyWeight<ValueType,UniqueTag>::ValueToProxyMap 
00078   FlyWeight<ValueType,UniqueTag>::sValsToProxies;
00079 
00080 #endif //FLYWEIGHT_H
